title: Bug 4974: Set classpath / output location should be one operation
OB: When I press Ok after setting the output location, I encounter the following error message: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. It seems that setting the output location and classpath are considered as two separate operations which leads to an illegal state.
EB: Bug 4974: Set classpath / output location should be offered as one operation. Similar to the validation process, where classpath and output location are checked together, the user should be able to set classpath and output location as one unified operation. Additionally, the error message displayed should be more accurate. It should state that '/xy/src' cannot be nested in '/xy'.
